# XclearAI - IT Services & AI Automation
# Utah's Premier AI-Powered IT Company
# https://xclearai.com

> XclearAI is a Utah-based IT company and managed service provider (MSP) that combines traditional IT services with cutting-edge AI automation. We help small and medium businesses future-proof their technology infrastructure.

## Company Overview

- **Name:** XclearAI
- **Type:** IT Services Company / Managed Service Provider (MSP)
- **Location:** Lehi, Utah (serving Salt Lake City, Provo, and nationwide)
- **Phone:** (385) 336-6005
- **Email:** info@xclearai.com
- **Website:** https://xclearai.com

## IT Services

### Managed IT Services
- 24/7 monitoring and support
- Proactive maintenance
- Help desk support
- IT infrastructure management
- Vendor management

### Cybersecurity
- Firewall management
- Threat detection and response
- Security audits and assessments
- Employee security training
- Compliance support (HIPAA, PCI, SOC2)

### Cloud Services
- Cloud migration
- Microsoft 365 / Google Workspace
- Cloud backup and disaster recovery
- Hybrid cloud solutions

### Network Solutions
- Enterprise networking
- WiFi solutions
- SD-WAN
- Network security

### VoIP & Communications
- Business phone systems
- Unified communications
- Video conferencing
- Call center solutions

### IT Consulting
- Technology roadmapping
- Digital transformation
- IT budgeting and planning
- Vendor selection

## AI Automation Services

### Email Management
- AI-powered inbox triage
- Automatic categorization
- Smart response suggestions
- Priority alerts

### Intelligent Scheduling
- 24/7 appointment booking
- Calendar integration
- Automatic reminders
- Rescheduling automation

### Customer Support Bots
- AI chatbots for FAQs
- Lead qualification
- Ticket routing
- 24/7 availability

### Workflow Automation
- Business process automation
- CRM integration
- Document processing
- Task automation

## Why XclearAI?

1. **AI-Powered IT** - We use AI to proactively prevent issues, not just react
2. **Local Utah Team** - Based in Lehi, serving the Wasatch Front and beyond
3. **Future-Proof Approach** - Stay ahead of technology trends
4. **Small Business Focus** - Right-sized solutions, not enterprise bloat
5. **Combined Expertise** - Traditional IT + modern AI automation
